item.title: Couple of questions for my server
item.dc:creator: @Darthruneis Darthruneis
item.description:
@Darthruneis wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:2, topic:257509”]Search for anything in your client.java that looks like this

if(command.startsWith("

When you’ve done so.
Please it above the “if”.[/quote]
Alright, I did that, and recompiled, is the message,

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API Note: Recompile with -Xlint :deprecation for details
good or bad?

And btw thank you for the extremely quick response

item.title: Couple of questions for my server
item.dc:creator: @Darthruneis Darthruneis
item.description:
@Darthruneis wrote:

Here is the code I’m using for Ice Spells to hold correctly, but its not working (at least not on NPCs, is that a different set of code?).

[code] public void inCombat()
{
LogoutDelay = 2;
}

public void entangle() {
    EntangleDelay = 20;
}

public void uberentangle() {
    EntangleDelay = 40;
}

public void rush() {
    EntangleDelay = 40;
}

public void burst() {
    EntangleDelay = 50;
}

public void blitz() {
    EntangleDelay = 60;
}

public void barrage() {
    EntangleDelay = 80;
}

public void rapture() {
    EntangleDelay = 160;
}[/code]

I also need to know how to stop NPCs from fighting back when you attack them, mage them, or range them.

No need to call me a noob, horrible programmer, idiot, any of that. I’m new to this, so shut it

Read full topic
item.source: Couple of questions for my server
